A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The biggest disappointment of the decade. 
The story is full of plot holes and useless subplots. The twists are so big and coming from nowhere that they kill the immersion.
Take the force for example\, it is used as a "deus ex machina" to solve every scenario dead-end.
They literally killed every idea from episode 7 as if they wanted to start on a clean slate for episode 9.

Mark Hamill is doing he's best to save the movie but the character's treatment is so disappointing.

Oh and almost every reference to the old trilogy is a failure.

So disappointed
